chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: Type
K_eq_dec: forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y}

Goal:
forall (l : list op) (ir : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l ir -> forall k : K, In (IRI k) ir -> In (I k) l

Premises:
Inductive op : Type := I : K -> op | O : K -> op
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive acknowledge_all_ops : list op -> list IR -> Prop := AAO_nil : acknowledge_all_ops [] [] | AAO_IU : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out) | AAO_I_dorp : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) out | AAO_IO : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out) | AAO_O : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)
Inductive IR : Type := IRI : K -> IR | IRO : K -> IR | IRU : K -> IR
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
acknowledge_all_ops_sind : forall P : list op -> list IR -> SProp, P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)) -> forall (l : list op) (l0 : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l l0 -> P l l0
acknowledge_all_ops_ind : forall P : list op -> list IR -> Prop, P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)) -> forall (l : list op) (l0 : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l l0 -> P l l0
Inductive acknowledge_all_ops : list op -> list IR -> Prop := AAO_nil : acknowledge_all_ops [] [] | AAO_IU : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out) | AAO_I_dorp : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) out | AAO_IO : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out ->...-> acknowledge_all_ops (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out) Arguments acknowledge_all_ops (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_IU _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_I_dorp _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_IO _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_O _ (_ _)%list_scope
AAO_IO : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)
AAO_IU : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)
AAO_I_dorp : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) out
collate_ls : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
collate : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> list (?A * ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
map2fst : ?A -> list ?B -> list (?A * ?B) where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
map2snd : ?B -> list ?A -> list (?A * ?B) where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
filter_rel : (forall x y : ?A, {?rel x y} + {~ ?rel x y}) -> ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?rel : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Relation_Definitions.relation ?A]
send_packets : name -> list (name * msg) -> list packet where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P]
do_send_packets : do_name -> list (do_name * do_msg) -> list do_packet where ?P0 : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0]
do_reboot : do_name -> (file_name -> option Core.IOStreamWriter.in_channel) -> data * list (disk_op file_name) where ?P0 : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?DiskOpFailureParams : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
nodup_inv : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (k l : list A) (a : A), nodup decA k = a :: l -> ~ In a l
AAO_O : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)
mkNetwork : list packet -> (name -> data) -> network where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P]
onwPackets : ordered_network -> name -> name -> list msg where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P]
NoDup_count_occ' : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A), NoDup l < -> (forall x : A, In x l -> count_occ decA l x = 1)
mkONetwork : (name -> name -> list msg) -> (name -> data) -> ordered_network where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P]
net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?MultiParams : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P]
input_handlers : name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?MultiParams : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P]
mkdoNetwork : list do_packet -> (do_name -> data) -> (do_name -> do_disk file_name) -> do_network where ?P0 : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0]
do_net_handlers : do_name -> do_name -> do_msg -> data -> list (disk_op file_name) * list output * data * list (do_name * do_msg) where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?DiskOpMultiParams : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P]
do_input_handlers : do_name -> input -> data -> list (disk_op file_name) * list output * data * list (do_name * do_msg) where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?DiskOpMultiParams : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P]
apply_ops : do_disk file_name -> list (disk_op file_name) -> do_disk file_name where ?P0 : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0]
nwPackets : network -> list packet where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P]
nwdoPackets : do_network -> list do_packet where ?P0 : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0]
before_remove_all_if : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x y : A) (l xs : list A), before x y l -> ~ In x xs -> before x y (remove_all A_eq_dec xs l)
before_remove_all : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x y : A) (l ys : list A), before x y (remove_all A_eq_dec ys l) -> ~ In y ys -> before x y l
in_fold_left_by_cons_in : forall A B : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (l : list B) (g : B -> A) (x : A) (acc : list A), In x (fold_left (fun (a : list A) (b : B) => g b :: a) l acc) -> In x acc \/ (exists y : B, In y l /\ x = g y)
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
in_remove_all_preserve : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (ds l : list A) (x : A), ~ In x ds -> In x l -> In x (remove_all A_eq_dec ds l)
in_remove_all_was_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (ds l : list A) (x : A), In x (remove_all A_eq_dec ds l) -> In x l
update2 : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
in_remove_all_not_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (ds l : list A) (x : A), In x (remove_all A_eq_dec ds l) -> In x ds -> False
reboot : data -> data where ?P0 : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P0] ?FailureParams : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- FailureParams ?P]
nwState : network -> name -> data where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P]
onwState : ordered_network -> name -> data where ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?params : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- MultiParams ?P]
nwdoState : do_network -> do_name -> data where ?P0 : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- BaseParams] ?P : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0]

```intros l ir H k H'. induction H; simpl in *.
- inversion H'.
- destruct H'.
  + rewrite H3 in H'. contradiction.
  + eauto.```
